    • Method Detail

      • registerRegion

        public Region registerRegion(org.bukkit.plugin.Plugin creator,
                             org.bukkit.Location loc1,
                             org.bukkit.Location loc2,
                             java.lang.String name,
                             boolean inVertical)
        Register a new region
        Parameters:
        creator - the plugin that created the region
        loc1 - an x, y, z coordinate of one of the edges of the region
        loc2 - an x, y, z coordinate of the opposite of loc1
        name - the name of the region
        inVertical - boolean to know if "y" is taken into account in the region
        Returns:
        a new instance of region
        See Also:
        Region

      • unregisterRegion

        public boolean unregisterRegion(org.bukkit.plugin.Plugin destructor,
                                Region region)
        Unregister a region (delete)
        Parameters:
        destructor - the plugin that deleted the region
        region - the instance of the region has deleted
        Returns:
        true if the deletion has succeeded
        See Also:
        Region
